subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Ryne Sandberg owns a most valuable player trophy, nine Gold Gloves and a plaque in Cooperstown. All those honors add up to a real prize these days: a front-row seat on a bus bouncing around the minor leagues.
snippet: Ryne Sandberg owns a most valuable player trophy, nine Gold Gloves and a plaque in Cooperstown. All those honors add up to a real prize these days: a front-row seat on a bus bouncing around the minor leagues.
